title.rendered: Jake Johnson on HR Issues and Pitfalls in The Independent

content.rendered:
The Summer 2014 issue of The Independent® features the Jake Johnson article “Funeral Home Staffing-Recruitment Employee Relations – HR Issues and Pitfalls”.

As our profession continues to evolve one of the most critical areas to address is funeral home staffing. It seems as though in the past there was a somewhat steady flow of qualified people to choose from. However… Click here to read the article (PDF).
